snippet: A federal judge ruled residents can vote if they sign an affidavit swearing to their identity....
abstract: Judge Lynn S Adelman of Federal District Court in Milwaukee rules that Wisconsin residents without photo identification can vote if they sign affidavit swearing to their identity.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled residents can vote if they sign an affidavit swearing to their identity.

headline.main: Wisconsin Residents Can Vote Without a Photo ID in November
headline.print_headline: Judge Deals Voter ID Law in Wisconsin a Setback
